data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - BNSF Railway - GE C44-9W Heritage 3
data.detailed_description: The General Electric C44-9CW (C44-9W, Dash 9-44CW, or simply Dash 9), is a type of 4,400hp six-axle diesel locomotive built from 1993 to 2004. The Dash 9 superceded the Dash 8, and more than 3,500 units were built. This model sports the BNSF Heritage 3 paint Scheme.
data.about_the_game: The General Electric C44-9CW (C44-9W, Dash 9-44CW, or simply Dash 9), is a type of 4,400hp six-axle diesel locomotive built from 1993 to 2004. The Dash 9 superceded the Dash 8, and more than 3,500 units were built. This model sports the BNSF Heritage 3 paint Scheme.
data.short_description: The General Electric C44-9CW (C44-9W, Dash 9-44CW, or simply Dash 9), is a type of 4,400hp six-axle diesel locomotive built from 1993 to 2004. The Dash 9 superceded the Dash 8, and more than 3,500 units were built. This model sports the BNSF Heritage 3 paint Scheme.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
